examples.example: 我们一定会按照约定准时交货，让客户满意。

translate.english: We will definitely deliver the goods on time as agreed and make the customers satisfied.

examples.example: 这次的交货过程十分顺利，大家都很开心。

translate.english: The delivery process of this time is very smooth, and everyone is very happy.

examples.example: 我们提前完成了生产任务，确保了交货日期不延误，客户对此非常赞赏。

translate.english: We completed the production task ahead of schedule, ensuring that the delivery date was not delayed, and the customer appreciated this very much.
